p: Admissions varied by ward, with an average of 3.0 new admissions per day on the adult in-patient ward, 3.8 new admissions per day on the pediatric ward, and 30.3 new admissions per day on the out-patient ward. Maximum daily admissions were highest on the out-patient ward (141 new admissions on a single day), lower on the pediatric ward (51 new admissions on a single day), and lowest on the adult in-patient ward (15 new admissions on a single day).
